profile:
Our Clients are #1 priority so we truly believe in high business ethics as far as relations with our clients are concerned. We strongly intend to develop a closer trust based on a long-term business relationship with our clients. Equally important to us is that our quality of products delivered matches the quality of our service. Our furniture is well maintained and spotless. If an item in our collection is damaged, ripped, broken or stained… it does NOT leave our showroom.
When you team up with Stagers Choice, you get more than a catalog of fine furniture, you get a team of professionals willing to go beyond to help you with your project and make your experience with us efficient & profitable.

We have flexible prices & lease terms and delivery all over GTA is available within 24 hours.
products: Sofa, Loveseat, Accent chairs, Coffee table sets, dining tables, dining chairs, sideboards, full beds, headboards, night tables, bedding sets, Rugs, cowhides, table lamps, floor lamps, wall art
services: Bedroom, living room, dining room, office, outdoor sets, accessories
specialities: We specialize in Furniture rental, we have every item to complete your staging project.

profile:
Founded in 2019, we are one of the fastest growing home staging startup in Toronto and GTA.

While there are many staging companies on the market, none of them provides the staging quality per dollar we are looking for when we are trying to sell our own property. As such, we see an opportunity to create a better company that provides outstanding staging quality and value than what was available on the market.

R3 Home Staging specializes in providing the highest staging quality per dollar. We strongly believe this is the best way to deliver the best value to our clients.

Through a long streak of wildly successful projects and word of mouth, we are growing faster than we ever anticipated. We believe our integrity, core values and unique presentation styles play a strong part in our rapid growth.

R3 Home Staging provides differentiating designs to showcase a property’s strengths. We understand the market and consistently helps our clients achieve record breaking sale prices in many neighborhoods across GTA.

What makes R3 Home Staging different is we do not cut corners. We treat each property like our own and work diligently to ensure each of our projects meet our high bar of quality and exceptional presentation.

R3 Home Staging
(647) 928-6588
info@r3homestaging.com
services: Design Consultation | Vacant Home Staging | Occupied Home Staging | Interior Redesign

profile:
The Property Designers, Brenda Bain is a certified Home Staging professional and a Real Estate Styling Consultant with over 20 years experience. Brenda has achieved certification through "Canadian Staging Professionals, Certified Home Marketing Strategist, Staging and Marketing Property Specialist and Accredited Staging Professional." 

Brenda is committed to excellence in the process of revealing the true potential of your home / investment. 

Brenda has an outstanding reputation partnering with real estate agents and assisting home sellers to get successful returns on their property investment.
Her attention to detail goes beyond her staging expertise, to getting her clients access and preferred rates to incredible professionals in just about every trade in the home improvement industry.

Brenda and her team's experience and expertise provide an advantage of managing the selling process with minimal stress and keeping cost effectiveness in mind to suit all budgets.

Every property is evaluated with buyers eyes because the way you live in a home and the way you sell a house must be two different things. "Buyers only know what they see...Not the way it's going to be!"

The ultimate goal of staging with The Property Designers team is to showcase a home in the best possible condition so its sells for the best possible price in the shortest time possible. 

FULL SERVICE STAGERS
Consultation- Packing- Moving- Staging-Unpacking- Cleaning- Grocery Shopping and More...
24HRS Service
products: Accessories, art, inventory for limited furniture and access to furniture rentals.
services:
Your house is probably your largest investment. Selling it can be one of the most important decisions of your life. 
Home Staging is based on merchandising a home's best features, understanding the real estate industry and the psychology of buying a home.

Our professional recommendations will evaluate and enhance your home's market appeal indoors and out.
 
As a professional Full Service Staging Company we will provide cost effective solutions to bring your home up to date by maximising the potential of your space. 
Our proven results takes away the stress of selling, attracts potential buyers and reduces your days on the market. 
 
Our services  include: Staging to Sell, Staging to Live, Colour Consultations, Vacant Property Consultations, Packing services, Moving services, Junk Removal, Cleaning services, Storage Solutions, and Professional Trade Referrals 
ie: Painting, Plumbing, Electrical, Flooring, Drywall, Handyman, Property Maintenance etc.
specialities:
Taking the stress out of selling, or Refreshing your living style while maximising your homes potential. 

Turning your home back into a house, and your new house into a home.

24HRS SERVICE
licenses: Professional Home Staging Certification, Master Business License.
